aoOCS Documentation

The OpenCores aoOCS SoC is a Wishbone compatible implementation of most of the Amiga Original Chip Set (OCS) and computer functionality.

Author:
Aleksander Osman, <alfik@poczta.fm>
Date:
20.12.2010

1.0
